General.Name: Yixin Group Limited
General.Description: Yixin Group Limited, an investment holding company, operates as an online automobile finance transaction platform in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in two segments, Transaction Platform Business and Self-Operated Financing Business. The Transaction Platform Business segment provides auto loans to consumers by its auto finance partners; guarantee, loan facilitation, and after-market services, as well as software-as-a-service solutions; and advertising and other services for automakers, auto dealers, auto finance partners, and insurance companies. The Self-Operated Financing Business segment offers consumers with auto finance solutions through financing leases. It is involved the information technology and technology development activities; and provision of commercial factoring, transaction, leasing, and subscription services. The company was formerly known as Yixin Capital Limited. Yixin Group Limited was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Wei  Zheng
